data.title: List of American films of 1995
data.text:
This is a list of American films released in 1995.

The highest-grossing American films released in 1995, by domestic box office gross revenue, are as follows:[1]

Highest-grossing films of 1995 Rank Title Distributor Domestic gross 1 Toy Story Walt Disney Studios Motion Pictures $191,796,233 2 Batman Forever Warner Bros. $184,031,112 3 Apollo 13 Universal Pictures $172,071,312 4 Pocahontas Walt Disney Studios Motion Pictures $141,579,773 5 Ace Ventura: When Nature Calls Warner Bros. $108,385,533 6 GoldenEye MGM $106,429,941 7 Jumanji Sony Pictures Entertainment $100,475,249 8 Casper Universal Pictures $100,439,549 9 Seven New Line Cinema $100,125,643 10 Die Hard with a Vengeance Twentieth Century Fox $100,012,499
